snippet: While crossing a street in Flushing with her grandmother, a girl was killed by a sport utility vehicle attempting to make a turn.
abstract: SUV strikes and kills 3-year-old Queens girl Allison Liao as she crossed street with her grandmother in Flushing; driver remained at scene and investigation is ongoing.
lead_paragraph: While crossing a street in Flushing with her grandmother, a girl was killed by a sport utility vehicle attempting to make a turn.

headline.main: S.U.V. Fatally Hits Girl, 3, in Queens
headline.print_headline: S.U.V. Fatally Hits Girl, 3, in Queens
